items.name: Vit Hit - Berry
items.ingredients: Water, juice (10%), (7 % blackberry, rose hip 1%, strawberry 0.9 %, blueberry 0.3 %, raspberry 0.3 %, elderberry 1%, blackcurrant .02 %, grape 0.3 %), Rooibos tea extract, citric acid, ginseng infusion, flavourings, sucralose, vitamin blend (vitamin C, niacin, pantothenic acid, vitamin B6, folic acid, biotin, Vitamin B12, Vitamin B1).

items.name: Vit Hit – Dragonfruit + Yuzu
items.ingredients: Water, White grape juice from concentrate (7.9%), citric acid, natural dragonfruit & yuzu flavour, concentrated ceylon tea infusion, Vitamin blend (niacin, pantothenic acid, vitamin B6, vitamin B1, folic acid, biotin, vitamin B12), gum arabic, glycerol esters of wood rosins, antioxidant – ascorbic acid, sucralose, zinc lactate, natural colour – anthocyanins.

items.name: Vit Hit - Mandarin
items.ingredients: Water, mandarin juice from concentrate (8%), Orange juice from concentrate (4%), natural flavours, green tea extract,vitamin blend: Vitamin C, niacin, pantothenic acid, vitamin B6, folic acid, Biotin, Vitamin B12, Vitamin B1; Antioxidant ascorbic acid, sweetener sucralose, citric acid,Natural stabilisers pectin and locust bean gum, colour beta carotene.

items.name: Vit Hit – Coconut + Pineapple
items.ingredients: Water, Coconut Water From Concentrate (8%), Pineapple Juice From Concentrate (2%), Modified Starch, Citric Acid, Natural Flavouring, Vegetable Oils (Coconut, Rape) Green Matcha Tea Extract, Antioxidant Ascorbic Acid, L-leucine, L-isoleucine, L-valine, Sweetener Sucralose, Vitamin Blend: Niacin, Pantothenic Acid, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B1, Folic Acid, Biotin, Vitamin B12; Stabiliser Pectin.

items.name: Juice Burst – Pink Lemonade
items.ingredients: Water, White grape juice from concentrate (25%), Lemon juice from concentrate (3.5%), Sugar, Orange juice from concentrate (1.4%), Natural flavouring, Acid: malic acid, Concentrated lemon extract, Raspberry juice from concentrate (0.1%), Antioxidant: ascorbic acid, Elderberry concentrate, Black carrot concentrate, Stabilisers: carob gum, Colour: anthocyanins.

items.name: Juice Burst - Tropical
items.ingredients: Juices from concentrate: Orange (69%), Pineapple (17%), Apple (11%), Passion fruit (1%), Mango puree (1%), Banana puree (1%).

items.name: Juicy Fuel. Cola
items.ingredients: Carbonated Water, Fruit Juices From Concentrate, Grape 63%, Lemon 2%, Natural Flavouring (including cola nut extract. Allergens - Barley Malt Extract.

items.name: Juicy Fuel. Cola - Cherry
items.ingredients: Carbonated Water, Fruit Juices From Concentrate, Cherry juice 14%, Grape 51%, Lemon 5%, Natural Flavouring (including cola nut extract). Allergens - Barley Malt Extract.

items.name: Cawston Press – Cloudy Apple
items.ingredients: 70% pressed apple juice, sparkling water, vitamin c.

items.name: Cawston Press - Rhubarb
items.ingredients: Sparkling water, pressed rhubarb juice (12%), pressed apple juice (8%), sugar, malic acid, Vitamin C.

items.name: Cawston Press – Ginger Beer
items.ingredients: Sparkling water, pressed apple juice (13%), sugar, ginger extracts, vitamin C.

items.name: Cawston Press – Elderflower Lemonade
items.ingredients: sparkling water, 15% pressed apple juice, sugar, 6% sicilian lemon juice, elderflower infusion, vitamin C.

items.name: One - Water
items.ingredients: Calcium 60.0, Potassium 1.3, Sodium 11.0, Sulphate 16.0, Chloride 16.2, Magnesium 7.7, Nitrate (as NO3) 19.0, Fluoride 0.05, TDS (Total Dissolved Solids) 240.
